page.title: 07SHOPS & SERVICES IN STRETTON
page.content: THERE ARE{TWO SHOPS}IN STRETTON ON DUNSMORE. ONE IS A{BUTCHER'S}AND THE OTHER ONE IS A{POST OFFICE AND GENERAL {STORE.}THE BUTCHER'S IS OWNED BY{JOHN J. ANDERSON. THE GENERAL STORE AND POST OFFICE IS OWNED BY ROBERTS & HUNTER. THERE IS A NEW SHOP COMING TO STRETTON CALLED{PRINTERS AND WRITERS. OVER THE{A45}ROAD, THERE IS A GARAGE. THE GARAGE HAS GOT A SCRAP YARD WHICH IS FILLED WITH CARS AND TRUCKS. THEY ALSO HAVE BREAK DOWN SERVICES AND DO MINOR REPAIRS ON CARS. THEY HAVE REFUELING FACILITIES. ON THE A45, NEAR STRETTON, THERE IS A TRANSPORT CAFE AND SERVICE STATION CALLED{BOB'S CAFE. WHICH CATERS MAINLY FOR LORRY DRIVERS. THERE ARE ALSO TWO PUBLIC HOUSES,THE{ {OAK AND BLACK DOG }AND THE {SHOULDER {OF MUTTON. }THERE IS A{DOCTOR'S {SURGERY}AND RESIDENT DOCTOR.
